attributes.action: Stop car insurance ripping people off
attributes.additional_details: my insurance last year on a new 15 plate car was £60 a month this years I've gone to renew it as have a lot of people to keep our cars on the road to drop the kids off to school or go do our weekly shop or our daily commute to work and now they want double if not more because some out there are doing crash and claim jobs well I'm not as 1000's of others rant but yet were being stung with the bill insurance companies make billions every year in profit but yet still keep raising our cover
attributes.background: car insurance is rising every year this year car insurance companies want double what we were paying last year even tho most of us have not claimed why should we keep getting punished with price hikes for those who do crash and claim

rejection.details:
The cost of car insurance is a decision for insurance companies to make, rather than the Government or Parliament.

You could start a petition asking for tighter regulation of car insurance costs, or asking the Government to work with insurance companies to lower the costs.
